title: Earphones now brake my Google Pixel 2 XL
content:
Starting today, when I plug in wired earphones/headphones, my phone either restarts (immediately) or thinks that the earphones are a USB connection (it lets me select data transfer / charging etc.)

This happens with all the headphones I tested, not just one.
I am using auxiliary headphones with the official google USB-C dongle.
The contacts on either devices look fine so it might be a software thing.
Restarted my device multiple times, but this does not help.

Thanks in advance for assistance
